value:
$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Geez... The Order of Heroes sure has
some amazing folks. Kings, queens,
even gods...$k$pWhat could a simple village kid like
me offer compared to them? Was it
a mistake to bring me here?$k$pThe summoner told me not to worry
about this kinda stuff, but it's hard to
keep my mind off of it.$k$pI need to figure out—hold on, is that
a voice?$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|$Fi1500|Hey, keep it together! One foot in
front of the other!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|I can't...take another step...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Come on, Ilyana, how many times
has this happened this week? Fine,
I'll carry you. Just sit tight...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Food... I need food...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Whoa! What's going on here? Did that
girl just collapse?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|She does this sometimes. Claims
she's too hungry to move.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Ah... You are newly summoned, yes?
It was so nice to meet you. If only we
had...more time...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Hang in there, Ilyana! If you need
food, I guess I could share some of
my packed lunch...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Oh, really? So kind of you...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Whew. Thought she was gone for
good that time.$k$p

$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Mmf... Grrf... Ahh. Thank you for the
meal. It was deliciously acceptable.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Whoa, you wolfed that down like it
was nothing! You must have been
completely famished.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|You made those packed lunches
yourself, right? I gotta say, they
looked super tasty.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Yeah, I'm a pretty good cook!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|I, for one, cannot wait to see where
your culinary career takes you with
the Order of Heroes!$k$pI'm certain they'll have you whipping
up banquets and feasts in no time.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Um... You think so? I'm not so sure I
can be of use to them at all, actually...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Why? Because you're young? Don't
sweat it. Ilyana and I are pulling our
weight and then some!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Your packed lunch was exquisite.
Please, have faith in yourself. You
have the makings of a master chef.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|W-well, if you say so... Heehee...$k$pOh! Since we're hitting it off so well,
will you be my friends? I'm Rebecca!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|I'm Mia, and this is Ilyana.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Rebecca, it is my deepest and most
sincere desire that our friendship may
stand for all time...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Mia and Ilyana. Got it. I can't believe
I've made two friends already! Things
are really looking up.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Before01,Face|Well, maybe hold that thought until
Ilyana's appetite comes roaring back.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少イレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Before01,Face|Now that you mention it... All of this
chitchat has set my tummy rumbling...$k$p
